pages.title: Industrial Crucible
pages.text: The <item>Industrial Crucible/$ is a crafting machine that converts items into liquids using heat. It only works above 1000°C.$(br2)It drains heat constantly while above 1000°C, but will work faster and drain heat more quickly at higher temperatures. The efficiency stays

the same.$(br2)<item>$(l:essentials:heat/cable)Heat cables/$ and pipes can connect to any side other than the top. Items can be inserted into any side.$(br2)This machine is typically used for, among other things, producing lava and melting metal items into a liquid. It can also double ores by melting them into 2 ingots worth of molten
metal, which can be cooled into ingots in a <item>$(l:essentials:heat/fcc)Fluid Cooling Chamber/$.$(br2)
